price: 42. Longola sé oyo Allah akoyokelaka mawa. Ya soló, ye azali wa bokasi atonda ngolu.
arabic: إِلَّا مَن رَّحِمَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: illā man raḥima al-lahu innahu huwa al-ʿazīzu al-raḥīmu
